title: Galle Heritage & Fort

itinerary.title: Galle Fort Exploration
itinerary.description: Walk through the historic Galle Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore colonial architecture, boutique shops, and charming cafes.

itinerary.title: Lighthouse & Beaches
itinerary.description: Visit the iconic lighthouse, stroll along the ramparts, and enjoy the beautiful beaches just outside the fort walls.

description: Discover the rich heritage of Galle Fort, a 17th-century colonial gem. Wander through cobblestone streets, explore Dutch architecture, and experience the unique blend of European and South Asian influences. Perfect for history lovers and slow travelers.
